rulesPage.title: Rules of Charades Game
rulesPage.description: The game is played in teams. Each team has a team leader. The team leader selects a word from the list of words and gives clues to the team members. The team members have to guess the word based on the clues given by the team leader. The team that guesses the most words wins the game.
rulesPage.ruleOne: The team leader cannot speak or make any sound while giving clues to the team members.
rulesPage.ruleTwo: The team leader can use any gestures or actions to give clues to the team members.
rulesPage.ruleThree: The team leader cannot use any props or objects to give clues to the team members.
rulesPage.ruleFour: The team leader cannot use any part of the word or any derivative of the word to give clues to the team members.
